MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: description: This topic explains the XML/XAML namespace (xmlns) mappings as found in the root element of most XAML files. It also describes how to produce similar mappings for custom types and assemblies. title: XAML namespaces and namespace mapping ms.assetid: A19DFF78-E692-47AE-8221-AB5EA9470E8B
